A

AboutProgram() - Method in class Mosaic.API.Information
This method displays the information about the build It must generally contain the following details:
- Program name - Version - Kernel Version [optional: with name in brackets] - Channel - Build date
AddUser - Class in Mosaic.API.Anima
A class to add a new user to the database
AddUser(boolean, String, String) - Constructor for class Mosaic.API.Anima.AddUser
Constructor to initialize the "Administrator" user during the setup program This constructor can also be reused for other upcoming implementation, with advancements.
AddUser(String, String, boolean) - Constructor for class Mosaic.API.Anima.AddUser
Constructor initializes if the current user has administrative rights
AddUserScript() - Method in class Mosaic.API.Anima.AddUser
This script will be executed to add a new user to the database

Launcher - Class in <Unnamed>

Log(String, String) - Method in class Mosaic.API.LogService
Creates a log file of given points in the program either as an [ERROR], [ATTENTION], [WARNING], [CONDITION TRIGGER], [NOTICE] This allows the developers to add the logging service to certain experimental modules which are prone to have potential errors.
The debugging information never contains any user identifiable information.
